text: Good morning, Jane! You haven't come back for dinner for quite a long time. Is your work all good? Have there been any interesting developments at work today?
Don't forget to send me those vacation photos when you have a moment. Love you, Mom!
Morning dear, hope you slept well. I'm looking forward to our chat later. The financial world never sleeps, does it? Love, Mom
Just watched an interesting documentary on investment strategies. It's fascinating how much things have changed since my days at the bank. Can't wait to hear your thoughts, love Mom.
